dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5569 IH: Child Care Nutrition Enhancement Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Landsman (for himself, Ms. Bonamici, Mr. Cuellar, Ms. Pressley, Ms. Jacobs, and Mr. Neguse) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act with respect to reimbursements under the child and adult care food program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Child Care Nutrition Enhancement Act of 2023.

subsection.text: Section 17 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1766) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraphs (1), (2), and (3), by inserting and subject to paragraph (7) after subsection (f)(3) each place it appears; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: Beginning on the first day of the first month that begins after the date of the enactment of this paragraph, each meal and supplement served under this section shall receive an additional reimbursement in the amount of 10 cents (as adjusted pursuant to section 11(a) of this Act).
in subsection (f)(2)(A), by striking multiplying the and all that follows through the period at the end and inserting the following:

clause.text: the total number of each type of meal (breakfast, lunch, or supper) or supplement served in such institution in that fiscal year, by

the sum obtained by adding the applicable national average payment rate for each such type of meal or supplement, as determined under subsection (c), to the additional reimbursement amount required under paragraph (7) of such subsection.

paragraph.text: in subsection (o)(3)(A), by inserting (including the additional reimbursement amount required under subsection (c)(7)) before the period at the end;

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by inserting plus the additional reimbursement amount required under paragraph (7) of such subsection before the period at the end; and
in clause (ii), by inserting plus the additional reimbursement amount required under subsection (c)(7) before the period at the end; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (t)(5)(B), by inserting plus the additional reimbursement amount required under paragraph (7) of such subsection before the period at the end.

subsection.header: Reimbursement of family or group day care home sponsoring organizations
subsection.text: Section 17(f)(3) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1766(f)(3)) is amended—

clause.text: by amending the heading to read as follows Calculation of reimbursement;
by redesignating subclauses (II), (III), and (IV) as subclauses (I), (II), and (III), respectively;

subclause.text: by striking subclause (III), a tier I and inserting subclause (II), a; and
by striking , except that and all that follows through section 9;
by striking subclause (IV) and inserting subclause (III); and
by striking subclause (II) and inserting subclause (I); and

clause.text: by adding at the end the following:

subclause.text: The additional reimbursement amount required under subsection (c)(7) shall apply to the reimbursements of meals and supplements under this subparagraph.
